item.title: Notes on Econometrics
item.description: True or False? Matrix Algebra (Arbitrary) Linear Model Gauss-Markov Assumptions OLS Estimator Derive Unbiased Consistent (Asymptotic) Efficienty BLUE (Best Linear Unbiased Estimator) CAN (Consistent and Asymptotically Normal) OLS Error Unbiased Consistent OLS Model Interpretation Elasticity Regression Table IV (Instrument Variable) IV Estimator \(\hat{β}_{IV}\) GIVE (Generalized IV Estimator) Maximum Likelihood Model Compare Models Linear / Log & Interaction : F-stat OLS / GLS : Robust Standard Error Weird Models R Workout Data Generation OLS Regression Warning: haven’t proofread yet
